This graph represents the trend of outbreak based on number of identified patients, reported deaths and recovered cases from the beginning of the pandemic.

The App is free to use and does not require any special permissions from the user.
The main purpose of this App is to show latest numbers and statistics of COVID-19 Pandemic.

The data used and displayed in this App is taken from NovelCovid API which further uses Worldometers and COVID-19 Data Repository by Johns Hopkins CSSE. We do not take responsibility and hence fourth any liability for any discrepancies in the data.
